name: Play Color Match
description: Play Color Match is a 1-tap nice endless game template for Apple TV where you have to turn a rose of 4 circles and match the color of the dots that fall down the screen when they collide with those circles. Dots get randomly generated, you get more falling dots while collecting more score points so you must be quick and tap the controller to match all the right dots. It’s a simple game, yet very addictive!
